alert.note: Alert for Fairfield; Newberry (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 21 at 1:44PM EDT until May 21 at 2:15PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Fairfield County in central South Carolina... Northeastern Newberry County in central South Carolina... * Until 215 PM EDT. * At 143 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Blair, or 11 miles northwest of VC Summer Nuclear Station, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Blair, Blackstock, Henderson Island, Maybington Fire Station and Feasterville Fire Station. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection seek shelter inside a sturdy building and stay away from windows.
